title: maneyoLagADO
sahitya:
maneyoLagADO gOvinda nere manegaLigEke pOguveyO mukunda


caraNam 1    nosalige tilavaniDuva acca hosa beNNeyanikki kajjAya koDuva 
hosa AbharaNangaLaniDuve muddu hasuLe ninnanu nODi santOSa paDuve
    caraNam 2    aNNayya balarAma sahida nInannallalli tirugADuvudEnu vihita 
heNNugaLEkO sangAta enna binnapavanu paripAlisau dAta
    caraNam 3    cOranenisikoLalEkO lakSmI nArAyaNanemba birudu ninagEkO 
vArijAkSara kUTa sAkO namma purandara viTTala nI maneyoLira bEku
